footer.mission: nudger.fr is an open approach to assess the environmental impact of consumer goods and partially offset the impact of your online purchases.

hero.mainTitle: The Comparator That Thinks About Tomorrow
hero.mainSubtitle: Your Free and Independent Shopping Assistant
hero.defaultSubtitle: Video demo hero to show a clean integration in a Vue 3 application.

seo.description: Explore the latest guides on sustainable appliances and energy-efficient choices from Nudger.
seo.tagDescription: Browse {tag} articles on Nudger's blog for sustainable, energy-efficient advice.

article.empty: The content of this article will be available soon.

seo.title: Meet the Nudger team
seo.description: Discover the collective of entrepreneurs, engineers and volunteers building the sustainable shopping assistant Nudger.

hero.title: The people behind Nudger
hero.subtitle: A passionate crew blending tech, sustainability and social impact.

errors.loadFailed: We could not load the team roster. Please try again.

sections.empty: The team roster will be published soon.

contact.title: Curious to chat?
contact.description: Want to co-create the future of responsible shopping or ask us something specific? We would love to talk.

seo.title: Contact Nudger
seo.description: Get in touch with the Nudger collective for partnerships, product questions or impact insights.
seo.imageAlt: Nudger logomark used for the contact page preview
seo.twitterImageAlt: Nudger logomark used for the contact page preview

hero.title: We would love to hear from you
hero.subtitle: Partnerships, product questions or impact insights? Our team is ready.
hero.description: Tell us more about your project, your organisation or the way you use Nudger so we can connect you with the right people.

highlights.commitment: Replies within two working days for most requests.
highlights.expertise: Product, data and impact experts dedicated to responsible commerce.
highlights.impact: Every message helps us build a fairer, more sustainable marketplace.

channels.title: How we can help
channels.subtitle: Pick the topic that suits you best—every request reaches the same caring team.

support.label: Product & user support
support.description: Questions about the comparator or trouble signing in? We will guide you step by step.

partnerships.label: Partnerships & ecosystem
partnerships.description: Looking to collaborate, integrate Nudger data or co-create initiatives? Let's explore it together.

trust.label: Press & civic impact
trust.description: Media, institutions or researchers can reach us for interviews, testimonies and key figures.

details.title: Different ways to collaborate
details.subtitle: Our collective unites citizens, entrepreneurs and institutions around responsible consumption.

support.title: Need help with the platform?
support.description: Describe your question in the form and share as much context as possible so we can provide an actionable answer.
support.ctaAria: Scroll to the contact form to write to the Nudger team

partnerships.title: Co-create impactful projects
partnerships.description: From retailers to NGOs and local authorities, we build bridges to accelerate ecological transition.

community.title: Join the conversation
community.description: Follow our updates, product releases and community calls on LinkedIn.
community.ctaAria: Open Nudger's LinkedIn page in a new tab

form.title: Tell us more about you
form.subtitle: Fill in the information below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

feedback.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We will contact you shortly.
feedback.genericError: We were unable to send your message. Please try again or contact us later.
feedback.missingSiteKey: Captcha is not configured yet. Please try again later.

name.length: Your name must contain at least 2 characters.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

message.length: Your message must be at least 10 characters long.

errors.captchaFailed: Captcha verification failed. Please refresh and try again.
errors.missingCaptcha: Please complete the captcha before sending.

form.privacy: We only use your contact details to answer your request and never share them with third parties.
